items.longDescription:
- Made from 100% ultra-long cotton fibers for a soft, glossy look and durable design.
- A casually refined style.
- This season’s updates include a straight silhouette to accentuate the draping fabric.
- In a well-balanced cut that is slim but still easy to move in
- This item has a brushed feel, and has undergone special processing for wrinkle-resistance.
- Adjusted the balance of the collar and used a firm neck for the base collar with a soft core fabric for the upper collar to create a perfect fit.
- The placket is made of soft interlining fabric, and the cuffs are made of firm interlining fabric.
- By reducing the number of stitches, this item has a more beautiful print pattern and the collar, placket, and pocket patterns also match. The color of the stitches and button holes have been carefully selected.
- The armholes and the underside have a beautiful finish and are folded down so that it does not touch your skin.

- With matte buttons for a refined finish.

- We have achieved better processing than ever before by working on the thickness of the warp and the number of strokes.
- The side seams are made of soft thread and feel great against the skin.
items.name: MEN Ultra Stretch Skinny Fit Jeans
items.shortDescription: Double the stretch. A pair that is more comfortable than ever.

items.longDescription:

- This season's updated design was to revise all the patterns including the knee position and creating a refined, slim, long, straight look.
- A little extra depth was added to the hips to increase comfort.
- The front pockets are slightly higher and the back pocket angles have been adjusted to accentuate your legs.
- A proprietary and unique distressing process, developed by the Jean Innovation Center's cutting-edge technology and jean-processing specialists, creates a timeworn, authentic look and feel.
- A careful repair process highlights a level of distressed style like never before.
- The buttons and rivet colors are made with natural, worn-in plating, so you'll love the details.
